body_html:
Pooling (and all of the above) isn't cudnn (or it is the non-cudnn version) , atomicAdd is a plain cuda function. We don't have a deterministic switch for the rest of PyTorch.

Oh alright, I don't have much knowledge about cuda. Thanks!

body:
> Pooling (and all of the above) isn't cudnn (or it is the non-cudnn version) , `atomicAdd` is a plain cuda function. We don't have a deterministic switch for the rest of PyTorch.

Oh alright, I don't have much knowledge about cuda. Thanks!
